org.edg.data.replication.optorsim
Interface AccessPatternGenerator

All Known Implementing Classes:
RandomAccessGenerator, RandomWalkGaussianAccessGenerator, RandomWalkUnitaryAccessGenerator, RandomZipfAccessGenerator, SequentialAccessGenerator, SequentialRandomEntryAccessGenerator
public interface AccessPatternGenerator

This interface must be implemented by all Access Pattern Generators. The access pattern defines the order in which the files are requested for each job. The getNextFile returns the name of the next DataFile the CE needs to access.

Copyright (c) 2002 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4

Method Summary
 java.lang.String getNextFile()
          Returns the name of the next DataFile to be processed by the ComputingElement, according to the implementing access pattern generator.
 

Method Detail

getNextFile

java.lang.String getNextFile()
Returns the name of the next DataFile to be processed by the ComputingElement, according to the implementing access pattern generator.
